name: Tiny
text: *Space:* Less than 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 0 feet, *Reach (Long):* 0 feet.  Multiple Tiny creatures can occupy the same square.  At least four can fit in a single square, though the GM might determine that even more can fit.  Tiny creatures can occupy a space larger creature as well, and if their reach is 0 feet, they must do so in order to attack.
